label: 仏舎利勘計記
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ぶっしゃりかんけいき
見出し読み_mod: ぶっしゃりかんけいき
説明文: Account of the inventories and distributions of Tōji relics which usually followed the conclusion of the Latter Seven-Day Rite, compiled between 950 and 1368. The same inventory and record are noted, albeit under slightly different names, in works such as Kakuzen shō and Go-shichinichi shonikki.
